message.name: ERR_FV_DOCUMENTMISSING
message.locale: A decision document must exist for the appeal case.

message.name: ERR_FV_NOTDECIDEDRESOLUTIONSEXIST
message.locale: A resolution must be specified for all appealed cases on the appeal.

message.name: ERR_FV_USERNOTACTIVE
message.locale: The decision can only be submitted for approval by the Hearing Official assigned to this appeal.

message.name: ERR_FV_REJECT_NODECISION
message.locale: Cannot reject the appeal decision as no appeal decision exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPROVE_NODECISION
message.locale: Cannot approve the appeal decision as no appeal decision exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_SUBMIT_NODECISION
message.locale: Cannot submit the appeal decision as no appeal decision exists.
